title: [K-12] Workshop on Designing Science Education Environments Using Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Learners participate in VR education using personal smartphones or tablets, experiencing scientific phenomena through simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain the six-step process required for designing virtual educational environments.
Learners can develop activity plans that effectively convey scientific concepts using VR/simulation tools.
Learners can design and apply assessment tools (quizzes, scenario tests) in virtual learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
